Description:
Tracking Devices & Accessories :
Device Configuration & Testing.
Schedule interventions & Testing with technicians.
Device monitoring, troubleshooting and support.
Research, testing and implementation of new products and sensors.
Customer Support & Training.
Software upgrades for existing devices and systems.
Hardware Stock Management.
Documentation & Team Work
Prepare end of day reports on daily basis.
Create flowcharts and other templates that summarize your work.
Document every aspect of the system as a reference for future maintenance and upgrades.
Organize & coordinate with co-workers from different departments.
Select photographs, drawings, diagrams, and charts that enhance user understanding.
Office Workflow
Test and evaluate existing & updated systems.
Determine & Discuss end-user requirements for user-friendly solutions.
Study product samples and collaborate with product designers and developers.
Get usability feedback from customers, designers, and manufacturers.
Provide attentive service for end-users complain & make sure to understand all details of the issue.Skills
Skills:
Excellent problem-solving skills.
The capacity to work well within a team.
Attention to detail.
Logical thinking.
Expert knowledge in how operating systems and software works.
Interpersonal skills as you will regularly be in contact with colleagues and/or customers.
